Text: Terrence Begley:  Begley was awarded the United States' highest award for bravery during combat, the Medal of Honor, for his action during the Battle of Cold Harbor in Cold Harbor, Virginia on 3 June 1864.

<Text: Terrence Begley:  He was honored posthumously with the award on 1 December 1864.>
